title: either new deb or install instruction for fixes

content.raw:
I recently install the entire system from the setup instruction the fix for the button pull not push issue still doesn't work.

Either release a new deb that can be install by the setup instructions or provide compile/build instructions for the independent fixes which I assume are contained in the default branch.'

90% of my efforts so far have been address software administrative function not programming the Valkyrie. 

ps. running hg oull && hg update default - yields no repsoitory found .hg not found
